documents.document: RT @northvanrun: You know what to do! Sign kids up for 1K at North Van Run and let them fly! It’s free for kids 13 and under. https://t.co…

Early Bird registration is extended til Wednesday! Run @northvanrun with us and use code JEANNINE for 10% off! See you in September! #northvanrun #westvanrun #northvancouver #vancouver #vancouverisawesome https://t.co/loNcVbKfJ5
@IslandSoapBox Don’t hold your breath 😆
@IslandSoapBox Europe is a lot more relaxed with their bike helmet laws but also respect cyclists more.
@AfterShokz Thank you!

Happy 3rd birthday @westvanrun 🎂 I had the pleasure of taking photos yesterday. You’ll have to go to #westvanrun crew’s Facebook page to see the whole gallery. Our next event is @northvanrun so come race with us. Use code JEANNINE & register at https://t.co/If9T23gWGY 🙌🏼 https://t.co/qjDfcAXXNS

Happy Canada Day 🇨🇦 ! Had a great day on the trails & of course I took my AfterShokz with me so I can have some tunes. I loved being able to talk to mountain bikers along the way without taking off my headphones. Here’s how the rest of the trail run... https://t.co/TXl9IH0nff

Happy Canada Day! It was a good day spent in Squamish. Went solo but kept myself entertained with my @AfterShokz Trekz Titaniums 🎶 Definitely needed it, so many riders out today. Here’s a recap of the day. #Aftershokzcabr #bibchat #shokzsquadCA https://t.co/TXl9IHhY6N https://t.co/PMPRX9bxRK
RT @BibRave: Sun, beaches, malasadas... don't mind if I do! Team BibRave will be traveling to Hawaii for the @HNLmarathon- hear all about i…

Must-haves at the track: my @BibRave water bottle with @nuunhydration & my @AfterShokz Trekz Titaniums to keep my pace up. There’s only a few hours left in the #Aftershokz Canada Day giveaway. Get your entries in! #ShokzSquadCa #bibchat #aftershokzcabr https://t.co/qsodCaRGLZ https://t.co/WcIHFx37J6

I can’t wait to get my hands on this!! Join us at @northvanrun on Sept 30th. Promo code JEANNINE will get you a 10% discount too! See you there. #northvanrun #wvrc #westvanrun #northvancouver https://t.co/x0Y77oGPb2 https://t.co/0sP9cdGwaC
@x4achange @AfterShokz It’s a good combo 😜

I love wearing my @AfterShokz Trekz Titaniums, they help keep me safe during trail runs. Enter their Canada Day 🇨🇦 giveaway & you could walk away with your own pair, in red! Contest ends tomorrow, good luck! #bibchat #aftershokzcabr #ShokzSquadCA https://t.co/qsodCb9iaz https://t.co/tNjsFvvPse

Ever been to Rome? It’s such a beautiful place and even staying for a week isn’t enough time to see and eat all the things. Here’s a glimpse into my trip there. #rome #travelblog #travelphotos #wanderlust #travelphotography #italy #eurotrip https://t.co/b6TSvoDRMz https://t.co/QJ9qRy9Xop
@BrendaRuns @parkrunCA Thank you!

It’s @westvanrun crew’s 3rd birthday! Come celebrate with us this weekend with a run and some 🍰 - 9:30 at John Lawson Park. All are welcome, just RSVP on the FB event. See you there #westvanrun #westvancouver #vancouver #runvan #runclub https://t.co/VtK5jnYhUn https://t.co/8uMw6xbFkW

Went to my very first @parkrunCA & volunteered as a photographer. Such a blast to be a part of this welcoming grassroots event. Check out the rest of the photos here. #bibchat #parkrun #sportsphotography #runningphotos https://t.co/6VAnDmcSVu https://t.co/IXMpUWAl48

Went for a quick run last night & kept the pace up with fast-paced music and my @AfterShokz - want one of your own? They are having a Canada Day giveaway this week. Enter by Friday to win! Good luck! #bibchat #aftershokzcabr https://t.co/0EaZLqqSdz https://t.co/aXftZUJhCJ

The Squamish50 23k is one of my goal races this year & I’m happy to say that it went so well, I’m considering running my first ultra next year. Huge thanks to Gary Robbins and the #SQ50 team for executing an... https://t.co/GkhpxMayzD
@NEWS1130Traffic Thanks!
@NEWS1130Traffic how is the sea to sky hwy southbound due to the accident?
@bjcjapan @erasureinfo Have fun!!
RT @MoustacheMiler: As @StanleyParkBrew finishes their new restaurant & brewey, we are thrilled to announce @MahonyAndSons Burrard Landing…
@ScottTDaley Happy birthday Scott!!! Have a great 30k on your 30th day! 🍻
@IslandSoapBox @cuski78 @Squamish50 Thank you 🙏🏼 we will need it.

@BibRave A4 I talk about the experience with someone and then try to focus on the next task. I need to mope around and over-analyze what I did before I can move on so however long that takes 😜 #bibchat
@BibRave A3 Alternating hard and easy days is a must for me. I also incorporate a strength workout and just do a short, easy run as a warmup. #bibchat
@mhaarhues @BibRave @oofos It feels great after a hard workout. #bibchat
@BibRave A2 I wear my @oofos of course, and also soak in an epsom salt bath #bibchat
@BibRave A1 Quads and calves... thank you trail running! 😜 #bibchat
@BibRave Hi it’s Jeannine from Vancouver! Hard to choose an all-time favourite but I love many Tarantino films. #bibchat https://t.co/u8MUiEDSMY

Will be trading in the Baden Powell for the technical trails in #Squamish this weekend. @cuski78 will be doing his first ultra @Squamish50 50k & I will be half crazy & tackling the 23k. Looking forward to our first #SQ50 experience! #bibchat #trailrunning https://t.co/6lPSXdlEVm

Less than a week until Squamish50 and we are feeling so many emotions. Training’s done, we just have to trust our feet, minds and bodies to crush this difficult race (made even more difficult with the expected... https://t.co/nUoYyOrqKw
@amandaklee206 Pearl Jam, Nirvana, Soundgarden, Jimi Hendrix
RT @cuski78: Cross is almost here - is your bike ready? #crossiscoming #bikinglife #cyclocross #cx #cycling https://t.co/H6INLdKq3Z https:/…

Happy BC Day! Where is this long weekend taking you? I spent time in the trails on Saturday and Sunday so today is reserved for some rest. Less than 2 weeks until Squamish50 23K! Who else will be there?
Exploring new trails & having beers with @cuski78 & @IslandSoapBox - missing @CTVScottHurst 😜#trailrunning #sasamatlake #runwild #5peaksrun https://t.co/pftIqEX0yb
RT @PennyDaflos: Here’s the story — and I promise it’ll make you smile! Lucas is a smart and charming little dude with a very bright future…
@cuski78 @indy_chris Quit your whining 😜
@BibRave A6 Yes! I've volunteered at a bunch of races. I try to do it as often as I can. #bibchat
@BibRave A5 New friendships, being in the best shape of my life (and getting better), and the ability to conquer challenges I never would've dreamed of doing. #bibchat
@BibRave It's the peer pressure and not wanting to have to explain why you didn't make that goal. That's what it is for me anyway lol #bibchat
@tmurph135 @BibRave and thank you ☺️I try to make my photos look good.
@tmurph135 @BibRave haha the PNW is just so hard to take a bad photo of @tmurph135 #bibchat
@BibRave A4 I wish I had a better system but I blog about my goals. Telling people about my goals gives me more motivation to achieve them. #bibchat
@BibRave A3 Nothing aside from eating a safe, tried and tested breakfast 😜 #bibchat
@BibRave A2 Comfort and style... It should feel like it's just a part of me and also has to look good. #bibchat
@BibRave A1 Just my everyday necklace or stud earrings... mostly because I'm coming from work when I run #bibchat
@BibRave Hi! Jeannine from Vancouver here. Favourite way to relax is just lying on the couch or an epsom salt bath. #bibchat https://t.co/aebciHk8bB
RT @northvanrun: Today is the day! Get registered before the price increase at 11:59 PM tonight! https://t.co/MP9S931G4o https://t.co/Bks6M…

The new @northvanrun medals look great! I can't wait to wear the 10K one. Register by July 31st to get the lower rates & use code JEANNINE for an extra discount! Looking forward to Sept 30 #northvanrun #wvrc #westvanrun #running #northvancouver https://t.co/If9T22ZlPq https://t.co/bT2kU4JXef

Sunday was spent on the Seymour trails with @cuski78 - it was a hot one, even in the shade. It felt great to get out though! #bibchat #runwild #trailcrewleader #5peaks #trailcrew https://t.co/9k9YoixhSJ

This weekend was busy and hot! Saturday was spent helping runners crush their goals at @CoastMtnTrail #buckinhell Seymour Aid Station. 2nd year in a row volunteering for this event & there will likely be a third. #trailrunning #volunteer https://t.co/wNYm2ss1kg
Congrats @CTVScottHurst and @IslandSoapBox for crushing the @CoastMtnTrail #BuckinHell relay today in this heat! #teamctv #ctvvancouver https://t.co/0YjQcxBVWt
RT @runnersworld: Our friends at @BibRave want to find the greatest 100 races in America for the #BibRave100. Help them out by nominating y…
RT @TransLink: @Sethrogen @stephanie_ip https://t.co/qvmCBwYhkl
Here are some of my favourite photos from my volunteer location at the Knee Knacker. #trailrunning #kneeknacker #bibchat #sportsphotography https://t.co/PfxOKLns4E
RT @BibRave: Every RUNNER matters 🧡 and that's why we need YOUR voice for The #BibRave100! Nominate your favorite races TODAY 👉 https://t.c…

Did you get into @SeaWheeze this year? If you're one of the lucky ones, check out my recap below for a preview of what you could expect. They know how to throw a great event. #seawheeze #running #vancouver https://t.co/PfCogSx8yR https://t.co/8tDUJWZfhe

I look forward to one last training run in Squamish before @Squamish50 23k in just a few short weeks. Getting nervous and excited at the same time. Here's my last #Squamish adventure on Canada Day. #trailrunning #bibchat #training https://t.co/8fnfAKCEuh https://t.co/fUWUVpXnfC

Mother Nature threw us a curve ball for @5PeaksRun Race 3 but we regrouped & came out with a great alternative. Srae Nedlog = Golden Ears backwards, a whole different ballgame. #bibchat #trailrunning #5peaks #trailcrew https://t.co/8q8QRkt7WJ https://t.co/jzlWCiGzWO
RT @BibRave: How do you eat healthy on-the-go? Join #BibChat tonight 8p CT with sponsor @NuGoNutrition to discuss. Win a box of NuGo Egg Wh…
Great recap @Ohgord and I want those shwings! They'll shave 30 seconds off my pace right? 😆 https://t.co/Fc4xrfynGY

For the 2nd year in a row, Mother Nature had other plans for the 5 Peaks Trail Running Seymour race but the team regrouped & came out with a great solution. It's back to Golden Ears Park but backwards! Read the race recap below. https://t.co/FoNRA0i1Hs
RT @MoustacheMiler: 👋🏻 HEY THERE 👋🏻 Early bird pricing disappears in one week. Get in at: https://t.co/4YMAAoGAYP before prices go ⬆️⬆️⬆️…

Alright, you keeners! Tonight's the last chance to get into the 2019 @westvanrun at its lowest rates. I'll be running both! Use code GREYELL for 15% off! See you there! https://t.co/jhxK8bEFfh #wvrc #westvanrun #running #Vancouver #westvancouver https://t.co/7xafhvXEB5
How was your sunny weekend? Spent Saturday with a lot of speedy people at Summerfast and then recovered on Sunday. Summerfast blog to come. Hope your weekend was as good as mine!

RT @bjcjapan: Running is more fun with friends! @debrakato @jeannineavelino @Ohgord
Congrats to everyone who ran @summerfast10k today! Tu…

My Hyannis photos from @kneeknacker are up on their site now! Downloads are $2 and proceeds are donated to North Shore SAR. These runners make running 30 miles look so easy! https://t.co/8upXZjIsiT #trailrunning #kneeknacker #northvancouver #photography #sportsphotography https://t.co/uD6UOcfDm3
RT @westvanrun: Monday is the final day of lowest rates! Register today at https://t.co/A68EJaZRT6 https://t.co/gBdvvVp4ao

The Grand Finale of the @5PeaksRun BC series is on Sept 29. Have you signed up yet? The Sport course is a great intro for beginners & the Enduro is going to challenge the advanced runners. Register here and enjoy beautiful Buntzen Lake #trailrunning https://t.co/AFQUeqgcQp

Have you registered for 5 Peaks Trail Running Buntzen Lake yet? This is a great intro to trail running with a non-technical Sport course but if you’re a little more advanced then the longer Enduro course will kick your butt. Sign up for the last 5... https://t.co/lbhUVpj0AA
@jackiedpeacock Mine is a small. I thought the black shirts were also tech shirts.

I created a new Instagram account for just my cyclocross photos. As #crossishere I figured it's time to showcase and celebrate this crazy niche sport. Follow here or if you want running photos, follow @jeannineavelino 😀 Or follow both! https://t.co/ao3mfB3gYW

I’m running the Coho Run as part of my long run on Sunday. It looks like it’s gonna be a wet day... how fitting 💦 🐟 🌧 See you on Sunday! #Running #cohorun #Kitsilano #northvancouver https://t.co/Zf9B1mYN92

Meet some of the awesome @northvanrun pacers! Have you signed up yet? 5k/10k/kids race on Sept 30. Check it out! Register at https://t.co/If9T23gWGY & use code JEANNINE for a discount. I’ll be racing the 10k so see you there! #running #northvancouver #northvanrun https://t.co/mPWv6pLUHL
Lucky @bjcjapan 😄🥞👍 https://t.co/L0RTwQKiPo
Props to @Nike - such an inspiring ad with a great message. #justdoit #nike #nikead https://t.co/9J8rY0YJ6X

I've gotten so much practice on these trails recently, I really want to try this race again to see how much better it'll be. A recap of @Foretrails_NV Iron Knee from earlier this year #trailrunning #trailcrew #ladiesofthetrails #bibchat https://t.co/OhTLdtH0fq
Do you ever run on your lunch break? I do & I have some tips to make it easier for you to get it done. #runningtips #bibchat #runch #runchbreak https://t.co/RTzccTGX9a
Baked goods galore at @summerfast10k - what a great race! Here's how it went for me this year. #summerfast #Vancouver #StanleyPark https://t.co/b1czF5wWeX https://t.co/VpRbtaACrP
I blogged about my surprise PB at VFAC Summerfast 10k Road Race this year. What an awesome race, can't wait til next year! https://t.co/YIn8Wq0Mw4
I can't do this race this year but you should enter if you're itching to go! https://t.co/zE7uW9iU9z
@IslandSoapBox @CoastMtnTrail omg uphill finish lol 😄

Went for a 25k run but also stopped by the @gscycling cyclocross clinic at QE park. Great turnout and lots to learn. #bettertogether #gscycling #gsxdontstop #mudsweatandsprinkles https://t.co/nnoFyuSm5A
RT @westvanrun: Only a few more hours until @northvanrun prices go up at midnight! Get in at https://t.co/zFvnnwzivh! Let’s run this town!…

Register for @northvanrun by tonight to get the lower prices, even lower if you use my code JEANNINE. New 5k/10k courses, beautiful medals, and an awesome finish line at the Shipyards. It's gonna be an amazing race. #northvancouver #running https://t.co/f8HtT4mv0w
@CristinaSchultz @berlinmarathon @ChiMarathon Yes so I'm pretty excited!
@CristinaSchultz @berlinmarathon @ChiMarathon Yeah I'm considering my first ultra next year :)

#tbt to my last marathon @berlinmarathon in 2017. 5 weeks from now I’ll be doing this again at another start line in @ChiMarathon - might be my last road marathon for a while but we’ll see. #berlin42 #marathon #teamnuun #nuunlife #bibchat https://t.co/AUr0J9gZ7W

RT @northvanrun: We’re down to final days of lower rates. If you are not in yet, make sure to register by Friday at 11:59 PM.

Lots of hydration (I prefer @nuunhydration cherry limeade) and my @SalomonRunning vest so I can carry everything: my @BUFF_USA , my keys, wallet, etc. #afternuundelight https://t.co/UCXykguLRR

Heads up! If you haven't signed up for @northvanrun yet, do it soon! You can use my code JEANNINE for an additional discount. Prices are going up soon so don't delay! https://t.co/If9T22ZlPq #northvancouver #northvanrun #running #vancouver #5k #10k https://t.co/UXuRO1DLXt
RT @westvanrun: Quick run to top of Mont Royal! 🏃🏽‍♀️👌🏼#westvanrun https://t.co/BPew1fDsOD

Finish line feels - 2 weekends, 2 epic trail races. First photo is by Brian McCurdy taken at @Squamish50 23k and the next was from yesterday’s @5PeaksRun Whistler taken by @robertshaer - Thanks for capturing these! Time to put my feet up. #sq50 #5peaks #runwild #trailcrewleader https://t.co/FCaJM8zaSX
RT @Ohgord: .@mec Perfect morning for MEC Vancouver's Trail Race Series to hit the #Burnaby Central Park Trails for 10K and 5K races. Some…

The @SeaWheeze Half Marathon is coming up in a month. If you've never run this before, check out my recap from last year to give you an idea of what fun stuff you can expect. #seawheeze #running #vancouver #halfmarathon https://t.co/Uuobb4n3hj https://t.co/JpGvggRjd4
